textBox.richText: Sushil Bhattacharjee joined the biometrics group at Idiap today to work on a new project on biometrics anti-spoofing. Welcome Sushil ! Sushil Bhattacharjee grew up in India. He received a PhD from the Signal Processing Lab at EPFL in 1999, on the subject of content based image retrieval. Since then he has held R&D positions at several Swiss companies, where he has worked on a range of topics including information retrieval, video-surveillance, and bank-note processing machines. He enjoys working on computer vision and machine learning applied to various problems.
